name: Miami Midnight club
description:
This is a Arcade style game. The background of the game was set in the early 1990s. You play as a Sport car racer to test several sports cars in Miami for a racing club.

How to Play：

Press "W" to speed up the car, press "A" to make the car go to the left, and press "D" to make the car go to the right. 

Winning Condition：

the longer the player can drive on the road, the higher their score. If player collide with other cars on the highway, the game will fail.
